title: Aurelion Sol in Tilt Brush - HTC Vive

embed.description: i spent around 2 hours or so just working on this in Virtual Reality. It's my third drawing in Tilt Brush. I'm also not much of an artist in real life xD WE NEED MORE TOOLS IN TILT BRUSH!

body:
This was really fun, not asking for RP or anything but that'd be nice! :D

Im not good at drawing in real life, and this was my third time using Tilt Brush.
Other than that, I had a blast making this. Wish they have more art tools.

replies.body:
Yesssss!  Two of my favorite things together :D

Huge fan of VR at the moment - I obviously need to have a go at making my own Aurelion Sol in Tiltbrush too!  I can't quite tell past the blue smoke, but did you use the space background, or the nighttime one?  (I love the sense of vertigo the space background gives.)

My last creation was a spaceship/pod like setup, with window out to the night sky, and a control panel in front of me.  Even though I drew it, it was very jarring to attempt to walk through it to draw the hyperspace streaks outside the window! :D  My fave thing, though, is sitting on the ground, drawing grasses, flowers, and trees all around me.  Very relaxing.

This guy must feel amazing to have a Riot member be the first to comment on his post. 

Rito doing good one comment at a time :3
I do feel amazing right now just to have you reply too !!!(:

I'm a huge fan of VR too! :3 it's been amazing working with tilt brush as well. I don't even draw in real life and everything just comes to life! 

Yes i used the space background! But wanted to get that background more like the picture so I added a load of bluish smoke . It looks even more amazing in tilt brush though. Let me know if you want to tilt brush file, I can export it for you to see!(:

Omg that sounds super relaxing! Definitely something I will look into doing now! Thanks :D
